stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to know exactly what ALFRED does with my personal data, and share it only on my specific permission.
actions: Share Personal Data Only On Specific Permission

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to receive information from ALFRED by speech technology.
actions: Receive Information From Alfred By Speech Technology

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to use only well-visible buttons.
As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED as much as possible with speech interaction.
actions: Possible Use Alfred With Speech Interaction

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to always keep control on the activities of ALFRED.
actions: Keep Control On The Activities Of Alfred

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to manage my privacy and data settings.
As an OlderPerson, I want to have a small ALFRED device that is wearable and easy to carry with me.
actions: Have A Small Alfred Device Is

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED on all my computers, tablets and phone.
As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED on a bracelet or a necklace, so that I can always wear him with me.
As an OlderPerson, I want to have clear instructions and service after sales that guide me if I have trouble in using ALFRED.
actions: Clear Instructions Guide Have Trouble Using Alfred

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that speaks very slowly and clearly.
actions: Have An Alfred Device Slowly Very Speaks

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that only reacts to me.
actions: Have An Alfred Device Only Reacts To

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that only listens to me when I ask it to.
actions: An Device Only Listens To Ask

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have an introduction conversation with ALFRED, so that I can learn everything about him and he about me.
actions: Have An Introduction Conversation With Alfred

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to buy ALFRED in a senior shop with special client support.
actions: Buy Alfred In A Senior Shop With Special Client Support

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to buy ALFRED for a low price.
actions: Buy Alfred For A Low Price

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to receive visual support, especially when looking at a list, map or agenda.
actions: Receive Visual Support Especially When Looking At A List
Receive Visual Support Especially When Looking At Map
Receive Visual Support Especially When Looking At Agenda

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to pay for small amounts.
As an OlderPerson, I want to have a very good battery for ALFRED so I can keep him on the whole day.
actions: Keep Alfred On The Whole Day
Have A Very Good Battery For Alfred

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that informs me about a low battery when leaving the house.
actions: Have An Alfred Device An Device Informs About A Low Battery When Leaving The House

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that can be easily adapted for user that have visual or hearing troubles.
actions: Have An Alfred Device Easily Adapted For User Have Visual
Have An Device Easily Adapted For User Have Hearing Troubles

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that repeats the last phrase.
actions: Have An Alfred Device Repeats The Last Phrase

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to zoom into visual content.
As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that responds to the changing demand of the users by offering new Apps in the ALFREDO platform.
actions: Have An Alfred Device Responds To The Changing Demand Of The Users Offering New Apps In The Alfredo Platform

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that helps me to communicate with my friends and family.
actions: Have An Device An Alfred Device Helps

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have video conversation with others.
As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have videophone.
As an OlderPerson, I want to have an AFLRED device that encourages its users for real interaction between humans and not only with ICT tools.
actions: Have An Device Only With Ict Tools
Have An Aflred Device Encourages Users For Real Interaction Between Humans

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that provides me with information about existing apps that corresponds to my interests.
actions: Have An Alfred Device An Device Provides With Information About Existing Apps Corresponds To Interests

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to customize my preferences in the different functionalities of the solution.
actions: Customize Preferences In The Different Functionalities Of The Solution

stories.text: As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have a simple ALFRED unit that is expandable in is functions.
As an OlderPerson, I want to have my data stored directly on the phone.
As an OlderPerson, I want to receive a wake up call from ALFRED in the morning checking on me if I am ok.
actions: Receive Up A Wake Call From Alfred In The Morning Checking On

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to receive day and night rythm support with agenda reminders.
actions: Night Rythm Support With Agenda Reminders

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to receive support to use the public transport.
As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED for navigation.
As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED for touristic walks and indications with explanations on historical and cultural sights.
actions: Use Alfred For Indication With Explanations On Cultural
Use Alfred For Indication With Explanations On Historical Sights

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to receive support to have a taxi on time.
As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to see who is standing at my door and open the door.
actions: Use Alfred Is Standing At Door

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to pick the phone sooner up when I am at home.
As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to turn on/off the lights.
As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to control the heating.
As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to control the TV and radio.
As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to watch movies.
As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to hear about the news.
As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to contact help in case of an emergency.
actions: Contact Help In Case Of An Emergency

stories.text: As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to use video calls in case of emergency.
actions: Use Video Calls In Case Of Emergency

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED contact the nearest caregiver when I ask ALFRED for urgent help.
As an OlderPerson, I want to receive a message when my home care nurse is on her way.
As an OlderPerson, I want to receive a medicine reminder from ALFRED.
actions: Receive A Medicine Reminder From Alfred

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to see whether I already have taken my pills, so that I can avoid an overdose.
As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to be able to see if the patient has taken her medicine.
As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to do my grocery shopping.
As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to send messages.
As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to detect falls and send an emergency to a specific contact.
actions: Send An Emergency To A Specific Contact

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to suggest healthy recipes.
As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED ask spontaneous questions but it would be better to programme it during certain times of the day.
actions: Spontaneous Questions Programme During Certain Times Of The Day

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to initiate questions, but it should be in the domains of my interest such as cinema, exhibitions, cooking.
As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to call someone with ALFRED.
As an OlderPerson, I want to activate the vocal interaction mode of ALFRED by pushing a specific button.
actions: Activate The Vocal Interaction Mode Of Alfred Pushing A Specific Button

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to maintain my contact list in my phone.
As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to manage my agenda.
As an OlderPerson, I want to insert my meetings into ALFRED using speech.
actions: Insert Meetings Into Alfred Using Speech

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to receive reminders on my appointments.
As an OlderPerson, I want to receive a reminder from ALFRED on all the things I need to bring with me when I leave the house.
actions: Receive A Reminder From Alfred On The Things

stories.text: As a SocialCaregiver, I want ALFRED to remind me of the things I need to bring to the person I care for.
As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to set up social groups of people with similar diseases.
actions: Set Up Social Groups Of People With Similar Diseases

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to contact people from my own circle.
As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to learn about art expositions or a museum.
As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to learn about all the social activities that are organized in my neighborhood.
actions: Learn About The Social Activities Organized In Neighborhood

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to get a personalized invitation to a social event, so that it motivates more to go.
actions: Get A Personalized Invitation To A Social Event

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to navigate to an event or concert and help me when I am lost.
As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to help me navigate despite my mild cognitive impairments.
actions: Alfred Help Despite Cognitive, Mild Impairments

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to organize a meeting with a group of friends at a certain place.
actions: Organize A Meeting With A Group Of Friends At A Certain Place

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to play online games together with other users.
actions: Play Online Games Together With Other Users

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to get suggestions for sports classes in my neighbourhood.
actions: Get Suggestions For Sports Classes In Neighbourhood

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to enable me to have face to face contacts as well, so that I do not just have virtual contacts over ALFRED.
As an OlderPerson, I want to help me to control my body weight.
As an OlderPerson, I want to just press one button to call my caregiver.
As an OlderPerson, I want to decide who has access to my vital data.
As an OlderPerson, I want to have the wearables with integrated sensors to look good and not to be stigmatizing.
actions: Have The Wearables With Integrated Sensors

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to see my vital parameters myself on the phone.
actions: See Vital Parameters On The Phone

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have the ALFRED shirt to look good.
As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to be able to determine the user's blood pressure.
As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to be able to determine the user's body temperature.
As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to be able to determine the user's heart rate.
As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to be able to determine the user's breathing frequency.
As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have feedback on the activity level of the user.
actions: Have Feedback On The Activity Level Of The User

stories.text: As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to locate the ALFRED user.
As a SocialCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to be able to recognize pain and or stress by using skin conduction sensors.
actions: Recognize Pain Using Skin Conduction Sensors

stories.text: As a SocialCaregiver, I want to have a step counter included into ALFRED.
actions: Have A Step Counter Into Alfred

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to give me goals and missions that encourage me to do new activities and exercises and to go out.
As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to set limits in the games duration as I get bored easily.
actions: Set Limits In The Games Duration

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to play games where I can use my Imagination.
As an OlderPerson, I want to do guided exercises with ALFRED and ALFRED should also use sensors to capture health data while I am doing exercises.
As an OlderPerson, I want to have games that include my favourite sports.
As an OlderPerson, I want to receive suggestions about local sport Classes.
actions: Receive Suggestions About Local Sport Classes

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to remind me to keep a good body posture.
As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to remind people to exercise regularly.
As an OlderPerson, I want to receive specific tips how to reduce my health impairments without medication.
As an OlderPerson, I want to have some games that show me how good my memory and physical health is.
actions: Have Some Games How Show Physical
Have Some Games How Show Memory Health

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to have training for specific muscle Groups.
actions: Have Training For Specific Muscle Groups

stories.text: As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to offer training for specific muscle groups.
actions: Offer Training For Specific Muscle Groups

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to see my training Performance.
As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to help to motivate me during the week to do exercise that should change daily, as the constant change motivates me.
As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to propose me games that require the combination of mental and physical exercise, such as opposing motion exercises of the arms and legs.
actions: Propose Me Games Require The Combination Of Physical
Propose Me Games Require The Such Combination Of Mental Exercise Opposing Exercises Of Leg
Propose Me Games Require The Such Combination Of Mental Exercise Opposing Motion Exercises Of The Arms

stories.text: As an OlderPerson, I want to games that require the combination of mental and physical exercise, such as opposing motion exercises of the arms and legs.
actions: Games Require The Combination Of Physical
Games Require The Such Combination Of Mental Exercise Opposing Motion Exercises Of The Arms
Games Require The Such Combination Of Mental Exercise Opposing Exercises Of Leg

stories.text: As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to control if the user does the exercise correct.
As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have a regular summary on how much exercise is performed by the user.
actions: Have A Regular Summary How Much Exercise Performed The User

stories.text: As an InformalCaregiver, I want to have a game that the carer could play together with the user, so that it would enable to monitor the users� state of health but also have some fun time.
actions: Have A Game That The Carer Together Play With The User

stories.text: As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to propose training that promotes complex thinking.
As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to give corrective feedback if exercises are performed wrong, too much or in any other way harmful to the user.
As a developer, I want to present my app to as many people as Possible.
actions: Present App To As Possible, Many People

stories.text: As a developer, I want to have the accounting to be as simple and clear as Possible.
actions: Have The Accounting As Possible Simple

stories.text: As a developer, I want to easily create and to maintain my apps within the market place.
actions: Create Apps Within The Market Place
Maintain Apps Within The Market Place

stories.text: As a developer, I want to enable customers to provide feedback about my App and need an easy way to watch this feedback.
As a developer, I want to have an easy way to manage the pricing modality of my Apps.
actions: Manage The Pricing Modality Of Apps

stories.text: As a developer, I want to have the API to be well defined and well documented.
As a developer, I want to obtain Apps development support.
As a developer, I want to know the fees the provider of the market place charges for using the platform.
actions: Know The Provider Of The Market Place Charges Using The Platform

stories.text: As a developer, I want to be notified as soon as possible when the state of any of my Apps changes.
actions: Possible Notified The State Of Any Of Apps Changes

stories.text: As a developer, I want to have detailed information of what happened when my App crashes on the user�s device.
As a developer, I want to present my App in several ways.
As a developer, I want to be able to design my App on my own - though there will be a few rules I have to stand to.
As a developer, I want to have an easy way to define questions the user can ask and perform.
As a developer, I want to have my App to be granted access to several operating system features.
actions: Granted Access To Several Operating System Features

stories.text: As a developer, I want to have the API components to be on a high level so that I don�t have to deal with their details.
As a developer, I want to have an easy way to read data from health sensors the user is wearing.
actions: Have An Easy Way The User Is Wearing

stories.text: As a serious games developer, I want to be able to take control over some functions to provide the desired user experience.
As a developer, I want to provide an easy way to manage the user Settings.
As a developer, I want to have the ALFRED API to reduce the work to achieve my goals.
